Privacy Policy

Last Updated: February 15, 2024

Introduction

Welcome to Peak Interval, an iOS workout timer app. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our app.

Data We Collect

  • Purchase Information: We process App Store purchase data to validate your subscription or one-time purchase status.
  • Usage Data: Basic app usage information such as workout play count is stored locally on your device.
  • Workout Data: Your custom workout configurations are stored locally on your device.

How We Collect Data

  • App Store: We use StoreKit to process and validate purchases.
  • Local Storage: Workout configurations and usage data are stored locally using iOS's UserDefaults.
  • No External Servers: We do not collect or store any data on external servers.

Purpose of Data Collection

  • Purchase Validation: To verify your subscription or one-time purchase status.
  • App Functionality: To save your workout configurations and track free trial usage.
  • User Experience: To provide seamless access to premium features based on your purchase status.

Data Storage and Protection

All data is stored locally on your device using iOS's built-in security features.

We use:

  • Standard iOS encryption for local data storage
  • Apple's StoreKit for secure purchase processing
  • No external databases or servers are used

App Store Data

We use Apple's StoreKit framework to:

  • Process purchases
  • Validate subscriptions
  • Manage trial eligibility

This data is handled securely through Apple's systems.

User Rights

You can:

  • Delete all app data by deleting the app
  • Reset purchase status through App Store settings
  • Manage subscriptions through your Apple ID settings

Analytics and Tracking

We do not use any third-party analytics or tracking tools.

In-App Purchases

Our app offers:

  • Monthly subscription with free trial option
  • One-time purchase option

All purchases are processed through Apple's App Store.

Changes to Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes through app updates.
